actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: To direct the Election Assistance Commission to make grants to States to carry out election administration improvement plans.

summary.text: Critical Election Infrastructure Act of 2008 - Directs the Election Assistance Commission to make grants to eligible states to carry out election administration improvement plans to promote efficiency and fairness in the operation of polling places in federal elections (including early voting sites), which may include: (1) acquisition of additional voting systems and equipment; (2) improved training of election administration officials; and (3) allocation of additional election administration officials to polling places serving greater numbers of voters.

titles.title: To direct the Election Assistance Commission to make grants to States to carry out election administration improvement plans.
